William

subject: Re: We have deposited your fund w
body:
ATTN:


uare here to let you know that your package will
be delivered to your nominated home address as soon as you comply with
this company by the instruction given to you.

Meanwhile: through our scanning machine we fine out that your package
contains an ATM VISA CARD which worth the total amount of $15.8
Million United states dollars and your mailing address where to
deliver your Package has been noted as the Insurance and the
Delivering Fee of your Package has been paid by Mr. Mr Eric Johnson,
But you have to pay this company their Security Keeping fee of $350
USD ONLY which your Package accumulated since it was under the Safe
keeping of the Security Department before we can dispatch your Cargo
for delivery.

============================== =========
SECURITY KEEPING FEE OF :$350 USD
============================== ========

Be Informed that the Security Keeping fee of your Package will keep
increasing until you pay the Security Department our Security Keeping
fee of $350  only, before we can go ahead and delivery your package to
you immediately without any delay, So my dear be advice to go ahead
and send the Security Keeping fee of $350  only immediately as soon as
possible, because that is the only last thing holding you as of now to
received your package as the real owner of it, However; you are advice
to send the needed fee via MONEY GRAM  OR RIA MONEY TRANSFER with the
information below;

HERE IS OUR CASHIER INFORMATION WHERE TO SEND NEEDED FEE THROUGH
(MONEY GRAM TRANSFER BELOW).

RECEIVERS NAME:......................GODWIN UGA
COUNTRY:...................... .....................; BENIN REPUBLIC
CITY:......................... ...............; COTONOU
AMOUNT;....................... .........;$350
Senders....................... ...Name
Senders....................... MTCN .

MODE OF DIPLOMATIC DELIVERY.
As soon as we receive the Security Keeping fee of $350 only, Our
international Diplomat agent will depart from Benin republic with your
Package and your Shipment Airway bill will be sent to you immediately
to track your Cargo to your given address within 72 Hours of receiving
the needed fee. Our Diplomat agent will call you once he arrives in
your country to hand over your Package to you.

CONFIDENTIALITY NOTE
The information contained in this message is confidential. This
message is intended to be read only by the person named above. The
unauthorized use, disclosure, copying or alteration of this message is
strictly prohibited. If you have received this mail and did not
request for it please discard with urgency. This mail was sent on
behalf of Package delivery in Dhl delivery code of Conduct.Registered
Trademark.

Treat With Urgency, Call us +229-62628302
BEST REGARDS.

Mr.Roobert John

(FOREIGN DELIVERY DEPARTMENT DHL BENIN)
DHL EXPRESS COURIER COMPANY LTD,
Regulated by the Delivery Services Authority

subject: Re: We have deposited your fund w
body:
This is to acknowledge the receipts of your mail this morning
regarding the releasing of your funds to you . Listen very carefully,
the total sum of (Twenty Million Five Hundred Thousand United State
Dollars) is your fund approved by IMF department.

Automated Teller Machine (ATM) card is another safely and cheapest
means to transfer money internationally; it is very confidential. It
helps customers because you can make your withdrawal comfortably once
you receive a package of your ATM card in your hand. The bank will
issue the card with your name and send it to you together with its pin
code.

We will register and deliver your ATM Card thru DHL Courier Company to
your doorstep.They will give you DHL tracking number which you can use
to track and monitor your  ATM Card from here to your doorstep in your
country. You will receive your CARD without any problem once you
comply with delivery and insurance fee.

You will be require to send delivery and insurance fee of your ATM
Card to enable us delivered it to your house address, The delivery and
Insurance fee of your ATM Card is $350 Dollars and you will require to
send it immediately thru to buy itunics card . We will give you name
and information to send it once we hear from you today.

We wait for your urgent reply

William
